author: mk46gunner
body:
Which scenario? 

Slept with a couple different officers as an enlisted and it turned out fine, the key is TDY and different branches.

...company owners daughter/my former boss as a civilian, was fine until it wasn't.

Fucking around at work is like playing 0DTE options after noon... It can go really well. It can go really bad.


Pro tip: married women in dead bedroom situations at home make for fun, guilt-free times.

author: jd_sleepypillows
body:
Even better, buy Puts, sell shares short then slip Cramer a crisp $50 and tell him to bash a stock for a week.
Reverse position once it’s fallen, get Mama Cathy to tel everybody she’s buying.

Close position. Everybody wins
Investing is easy
